pxchat.net.tcp
Class CustomSocket

java.lang.Object
  pxchat.net.tcp.CustomSocket
Direct Known Subclasses:
TCPClient
public class CustomSocket
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a socket that is able to read and write encrypted objects to a TCP socket using object input and object output streams.

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger

Constructor Detail

CustomSocket

protected CustomSocket(java.net.Socket socket,
                       TCPClientListener tcpClientListener)
Gets called from a server when a client connects. Do not call this constructor yourself!

Parameters:
socket - The client socket connected to the server.
tcpClientListener - The listener waiting for socket events.

CustomSocket

protected CustomSocket(TCPClientListener tcpClientListener)
Constructs a new custom socket with a specified listener. No connection is established.
